fact_check_explanation_title: A newly released document does not reveal ‘side effects’ of the Pfizer vaccine
fact_check_explanation_summary: It lists reported adverse events, which may not have been caused by the vaccine. It also concludes that its data raises no safety concerns.

fact_check_explanation_title: The price of fuel is quite closely connected to the price of oil
fact_check_explanation_summary: A Facebook post made it look like the fuel price is rising faster than oil, because it used fuel prices that were not adjusted for inflation.

fact_check_explanation_title: Picture of Putin popping Ukraine balloon isn’t a Banksy
fact_check_explanation_summary: The clearly-edited image has been shared tens of thousands of times on Facebook.

fact_check_explanation_title: Express publishes misleading article about safety of the Pfizer Covid-19 vaccine
fact_check_explanation_summary: A recently published US document listing adverse events does not show “side effects” of the vaccine. Nor is it the first time the public have been able to see data …

fact_check_explanation_title: Video of underground tunnel isn’t a secret UK military site
fact_check_explanation_summary: A Facebook post says it’s ‘UK Area 51’, but it’s actually a decommissioned nuclear bunker that has been shown to the outside world many times.

fact_check_explanation_title: Video doesn’t show Ukrainian president and his wife covering a Lionel Richie song
fact_check_explanation_summary: Facebook posts shared thousands of times claim to show Volodymyr Zelenskyy singing a duet.

fact_check_explanation_title: Why is petrol more expensive now than it was 15 years ago?
fact_check_explanation_summary: International oil prices recently reached similar levels to 2008, but pump prices haven’t dropped to what they were back then.

fact_check_explanation_title: Labour graph showing reduction in army size is misleading
fact_check_explanation_summary: The graph suggests a reduction in army numbers planned to take place by 2025 had already happened in 2021.

fact_check_explanation_title: Video of person moving inside body bag isn’t from Ukraine
fact_check_explanation_summary: It’s actually from a climate protest in Vienna.
Michael Gove recently claimed that the concept was conceived under a Labour Home Secretary.

fact_check_explanation_title: Is sharing photographs of prisoners of war banned by the Geneva Convention?
fact_check_explanation_summary: Legal opinion suggests sharing photographs of prisoners of war doesn’t necessarily breach the Convention—but it still may be better not to do so.

fact_check_explanation_title: Edited image falsely claims to show Ukrainian tractor pulling Russian rocket
fact_check_explanation_summary: An image from 2018 of a space rocket on board a train has been edited to show it being pulled by a tractor.
